component.name: Manatan
component.summary: Manga Reader with OCR and Instant Dictionary

description.p: Manatan is a manga reader designed for Japanese language learners. It features built-in OCR and instant popup dictionary lookups.

ul.li: Click any text bubble to OCR it instantly.
Click words in the overlay to see readings and meanings.
Supports local files (ZIP, EPUB, CBZ, RAR).
Connects to self-hosted servers like Komga.
